title: Buttermilk seeded loaf
ingredients: ['1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '175ml (6 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '350ml (12 fl oz) buttermilk', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 dessertspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '2 tablespoons flax seeds', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '2 tablespoons sunflower seeds', '250g (8 oz) wholemeal flour', '550g (1 1/4 lb) bread flour']
